mapper.select: SELECT c.cId, c.userId, p.pNo, m.userName, p.pName, p.pImg, c.count, p.pPrice, (c.count * p.pPrice) as money FROM tr_member m, tr_pro p, tr_cart c WHERE m.userId = c.userId AND p.pNo = c.pNo AND c.userId = #{userId} ORDER BY cId DESC
SELECT NVL(SUM(pPrice * count), 0) money FROM tr_pro p, tr_cart c WHERE p.pNo = c.pNo AND c.userId = #{userId}
